# archestra_prompt_versions (Data Source)

Provides a list of versions for a specific Archestra prompt.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "archestra_prompt_versions" "example" {
  prompt_id = "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `prompt_id` (String) The identifier of the prompt to list versions for

### Read-Only

- `versions` (Attributes List) List of prompt versions (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--versions))

<a id="nestedatt--versions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `versions`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Version identifier
- `is_active` (Boolean) Whether this version is active
- `name` (String) The name of the prompt at this version
- `system_prompt` (String) The system prompt at this version
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when this version was created/updated
- `user_prompt` (String) The user prompt at this version
- `version` (Number) The version number
